Translations.Text: Ṣé o ò rí i pé dájúdájú Allāhu l’Ó ṣẹ̀dá àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ pẹ̀lú òdodo? Tí Ó bá fẹ́, Ó máa ko yín kúrò. Ó sì máa mú ẹ̀dá titun wá
Ìyẹn kò sì lè dá Allāhu lágara

Gbogbo ẹ̀dá sì máa jáde sọ́dọ̀ Allāhu (lọ́jọ́ Àjíǹde). Nígbà náà, àwọn aláìlágbára yóò wí fún àwọn t’ó ṣègbéraga pé: “Dájúdájú àwa jẹ́ ọmọlẹ́yìn fun yín, ǹjẹ́ ẹ̀yin lè gbé n̄ǹkan kan kúrò fún wa nínú ìyà Allāhu?” Wọn yóò wí pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé Allāhu tọ́ wa sọ́nà ni, àwa ìbá tọ yín sọ́nà. Bákan náà sì ni fún wa, yálà a káyà sókè tàbí a ṣàtẹ̀mọ́ra (ìyà); kò sí ibùsásí kan fún wa.”

Èṣù yó sì wí nígbà tí A bá ṣèdájọ́ (ẹ̀dá) tán, pé: “Dájúdájú Allāhu ṣe àdéhùn fun yín ní àdéhùn òdodo. Èmi náà ṣe àdéhùn fun yín. Mo sì yapa àdéhùn tí mo ṣe fun yín. Èmi kò sì ní agbára kan lórí yín bí kò ṣe pé mo pè yín ẹ sì jẹ́pè mi. Nítorí náà, ẹ má ṣe bú mi; ara yín ni kí ẹ bú. Èmi kò lè ràn yín lọ́wọ́ (níbi ìyà), Ẹ̀yin náà kò sì lè ràn mí lọ́wọ́ (níbi ìyà). Dájúdájú èmi ti lòdì sí ohun tí ẹ fi sọ mí di akẹgbẹ́ Allāhu ṣíwájú.” Dájúdájú àwọn alábòsí, ìyà ẹlẹ́ta-eléro wà fún wọn

Wọ́n sì máa mú àwọn t’ó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ rere wọ inú àwọn Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra, èyí tí àwọn odò ń ṣàn ní ìsàlẹ̀ rẹ̀. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àṣẹ Olúwa wọn. Ìkíni wọn nínú rẹ̀ ni ‘àlàáfíà’
Ṣé o ò rí bí Allāhu ti ṣàkàwé ọ̀rọ̀ dáadáa pẹ̀lú igi dáadáa, tí gbòǹgbò rẹ̀ fìdí múlẹ̀ ṣinṣin, tí ẹka rẹ̀ sì wà nínú sánmọ̀
